q: African nations have also voiced support for Alassane Ouattara . On Thursday, Alassane Ouattara received an invitation to pay a state visit from President Ian Khama of Botswana. Ian Khama said the invitation to visit the southern African nation was in recognition of( Alassane Ouattara 's) victory of the presidential elections. Simon Munzu said Thursday that security forces loyal to Gbagbo had used sexual torture techniques on at least one Alassane Ouattara supporter, following a raid on Alassane Ouattara 's party headquarters two weeks ago in which 63 people were arrested

DALLAS- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as the host of a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Speaking at his annual Super Bowl news conference Friday, the commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans.``

But the promotional period ends on 30 June this year. Here's the significant bit about yesterday's announcement:`` The service is available today as a cloud offering,'' said Steve Ballmer . This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud. All of which chimes well with an internal MS memo seen by this reporter last October that noted:`` Business processes that have remained untouched for years urgently need to be examined.''
